thread.section_title: Thrift Books Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Thrift Books | www.thriftbooks.com | 168 of 3757
thread.title: Eileen

author: Eileen
title: Eileen
text: I received all 31 books I ordered within 7 business days of placing my order. I work with a lot of preschool students who are rough on books and I don't get a large stipend for materials. So thrift books was the perfect way to get a lot of bang for my buck. Every book's condition was as described (or better). There was one book listed as "good" and a few pages fell out the first time I used it. However, I was able to glue them back into place so it wasn't that big of a deal. I have already recommended this site to coworkers/friends!
